committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing a public ceremony on the West Lawn of the Capitol in honor of the Bicentennial of the United States Constitution.

summary.text: Authorizes the Commission on the Bicentennial of the United States Constitution to conduct a ceremony on the West Terraces and Lawns of the United States Capitol entitled "Celebration of Citizenship" on September 16, 1987. Authorizes the Commission to erect upon the Capitol grounds such structures and equipment as necessary.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing a public ceremony on the West Lawn of the Capitol in honor of the Bicentennial of the United States Constitution.
